author: Special Correspondent
text:
The 121st birth anniversary celebrations of O. P. Ramaswamy Reddiyar, former Premier of Madras Presidency, on Monday at Omandur witnessed leaders of several parties sharing the dais.

BJP leader and Union Minister Venkaiah Naidu released a commemorative souvenir which was received by PMK founder S.Ramadoss and TNCC chief E.V.K.S. Elangovan.

Tamil Nadu Reddy Association president G. Renganthan urged the State government to name the hospital and medical college in the Omandurar government estate after Omandurar.
title: O.P. Ramaswamy Reddiyar’s birth anniversary observed
